comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: This U.S. Navy fleet became commonly known as the Great White Fleet due to the white livery of the ships. It was of great significance because the Prime Minister Alfred Deakin ignored Great Britain's aversion to the fleet's mission (of spreading U.S. goodwill and power), and many also consider that it inspired the formation of Australia's Royal Australian Navy. Useful information and ephemera here: www.awm.gov.au/exhibitions/forging/security/fleet.asp gallery.records.nsw.gov.au/index.php/galleries/the-great-...
